$queueName = "QUEUE_NAME";
 

$client = new SqsClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2012-11-05'
]);

try {
    $result = $client->createQueue(array(
        'QueueName' => $queueName,
        'Attributes' => array(
            'ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds' => 20
        ),
    ));
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    error_log($e->getMessage());
}
